data.title: THE FALL OF HYPERION
data.meta_description: New York: Doubleday / A Foundation Book, 1990 . Octavo, cloth backed boards. First edition. Sequel to HYPERION. ...beautifully written and have few equals for sheer, large scale sense of wonder. - Anatomy of Wonder 2004 II-1033. Hugo and Nebula award nominee. Winner of the 1992 British Science Fiction Association Award for best novel. Errata slip laid in. A fine copy in a fine dust
data.text:
Simmons, Dan.

New York: Doubleday / A Foundation Book, [1990]. Octavo, cloth backed boards. First edition. Sequel to HYPERION. "...beautifully written and have few equals for sheer, large scale sense of wonder." - Anatomy of Wonder (2004) II-1033. Hugo and Nebula award nominee. Winner of the 1992 British Science Fiction Association Award for best novel. Errata slip laid in. A fine copy in a fine dust jacket. (31268). Item #31268
